summary:
A developed country has a high standard of living, a strong economy, and advanced technology. These countries are often known for their service-based economies, where businesses like banks and technology companies are major contributors to wealth.

The International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the United Nations (UN) have specific ways to classify these countries. As of 2023, around 40 countries meet all the criteria for being considered developed. These countries make up a large part of the world's economy.
title: Developed country
